sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Subject } from 'rxjs'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-loader', templateUrl: './loader.component.html', styleUrls: ['./loader.component.scss'] }) export class LoaderComponent { isLoading: Subject = this.userServ.isLoading; constructor(private userServ: UserService) { } }
